main event: Two reports of UFO sightings were made in Macon, Georgia on May 20, 1964.
interesting points: The first sighting was by Lt. Hoscrore at approximately 30,000 feet,The second sighting was reported by AIC Lawrence J. Seaick at above 20,000 feet traveling north to south, Both reports were made around the same time and location, The Robbins command post suggested the sightings were likely caused by the flight of KC-135 aircraft, Time of the first sighting may have been in error.
sighted object: bright light and objects traveling at high altitudes
witness description: one from the sheriff's department and another from Robins AFB
